Text:
this is the Imagine cam.
there are a few glitches in both audio & video
there are silhouettes of audience members crossing the bottom of the screen
it is dark which is not helped by the many night scenes
I have just enjoyed watching it & am glad to have seen it in early August, immediately after seeing the adverts for it on telly - I think from this that I will watch at the cinema as well :)
Thanks uploaders!
